templateData.kat:
The Skeleton Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Common}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_common_level_1 = {{Coins|5,000}}
512 [[File:Minecraft_items_bone.png|25px|link=Bone]] [[Bone]] |cost_common_level_100 = {{Coins|3,500}}
512 [[File:Minecraft_items_bone.png|25px|link=Bone]] [[Bone]] |time_common = 5 Minutes |cost_uncommon_level_1 = {{Coins|10,000}}
8 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |cost_uncommon_level_100 = {{Coins|7,000}}
8 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |time_uncommon = 10 Minutes |cost_rare_level_1 = {{Coins|25,000}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |cost_rare_level_100 = {{Coins|17,500}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |time_rare = 15 Minutes |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|50,000}}
32 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|35,000}}
32 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |time_epic = 30 Minutes |rarity_low = {{Common}} |rarity_high = {{Legendary}} |cost_total_level_1 = {{Coins|90,000}}
512 [[File:Minecraft_items_bone.png|25px|link=Bone]] [[Bone]]
56 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |cost_total_level_100 = {{Coins|63,000}}
512 [[File:Minecraft_items_bone.png|25px|link=Bone]] [[Bone]]
56 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_bone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Bone]] [[Enchanted Bone]] |time_total = 1 Hour }}
